summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of Shyntr IAM Dashboard - Iteration 2 with major restructuring. All backend APIs working perfectly, frontend mostly functional with minor modal interaction issues.

ui_bugs.issue: Modal overlay intercepting clicks on tab buttons in certain dialogs
ui_bugs.workaround: Use force=True clicks or add wait for overlay to settle

design_issues.issue: Chart width/height warnings in console - charts need proper container sizing

passed_tests: Backend API: Dashboard stats endpoint with new fields (total_oidc_clients, total_saml_clients, etc.) ✅
Backend API: OIDC Clients CRUD operations ✅
Backend API: SAML Clients CRUD operations ✅
Backend API: SAML Connections CRUD operations ✅
Backend API: OIDC Connections CRUD operations ✅
Backend API: Tenants CRUD operations with default tenant protection ✅
Backend API: Error handling and validation (404s, duplicates, default tenant restrictions) ✅
Frontend: Dashboard page loads with updated stats cards (Applications, Connections, Tenants, Health) ✅
Frontend: Protocol badges correctly showing OIDC=teal, SAML=orange ✅
Frontend: Sidebar navigation with collapsible Applications menu (OIDC Clients, SAML Clients) ✅
Frontend: Sidebar navigation with collapsible Connections menu (OIDC Providers, SAML Providers) ✅
Frontend: OIDC Clients page with tabbed dialog (Basic, OAuth Settings, Security) ✅
Frontend: OIDC Clients page with grant types, response types, auth method dropdown ✅
Frontend: SAML Clients page with tabs and Monaco JSON editor for attribute mapping ✅
Frontend: SAML Connections page with metadata XML textarea and paste button ✅
Frontend: OIDC Connections page with advanced endpoint overrides ✅
Frontend: Tenants page with card layout and protected default tenant ✅
Frontend: Theme toggle between dark/light mode ✅
Frontend: Quick action buttons navigation from dashboard ✅
Integration: Frontend-backend API communication working perfectly ✅
Integration: All CRUD operations properly integrated ✅

success_percentage.backend: 100% - All 40 API tests passed including new Tenants and separated OIDC/SAML clients
success_percentage.frontend: 95% - All major UI functionality working, minor modal interaction issue

action_item_for_main_agent: Minor UI fix needed: Modal overlay in dialogs occasionally intercepts tab clicks - needs force=True or overlay settling wait
